mapper.select: select '' v_0,'合计' v_1,count(v_1) v_2,'' v_3, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30 from jhzxqkb

select '' v_0,min(sgydw)||'合计' v_1,count(v_1) v_2,'' v_3, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30,sgydwdm gydwdm from jhzxqkb group by sgydwdm order by gydwdm

select '' v_0,min(v_2)||'合计' v_1,count(v_1) v_2,'' v_3, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30,gydwdm from jhzxqkb where gydwdm like '1%' group by gydwdm order by gydwdm

select '' v_0,v_1||'合计' v_1,count(v_1) v_2,'' v_3, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30,gydwdm from jhzxqkb where gydwdm like '1%' group by gydwdm,v_1 union all select '' v_0,v_1||'合计' v_1,count(v_1) v_2,'' v_3, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30,to_char(sgydwdm) from jhzxqkb where sgydwdm like '2%' group by sgydwdm,v_1
order by gydwdm,v_1

select '' v_0,'合计' v_1,sum(v_2) v_2,'' v_3,sum(nvl(v_4,0)) v_4,sum(nvl(v_5,0)) v_5,sum(nvl(round(v_6,5),0)) v_6,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_6,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_7, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30 from jhzxqkb_xm

select '' v_0,min(sgydw)||'合计' v_1,sum(v_2) v_2,'' v_3,sum(nvl(v_4,0)) v_4,sum(nvl(v_5,0)) v_5,sum(nvl(round(v_6,5),0)) v_6,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_6,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_7, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30,sgydwdm gydwdm from jhzxqkb_xm group by sgydwdm order by gydwdm

select '' v_0,min(gydw)||'合计' v_1,sum(v_2) v_2,'' v_3,sum(nvl(v_4,0)) v_4,sum(nvl(v_5,0)) v_5,sum(nvl(v_6,0)) v_6,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_6,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_7, sum(nvl(v_8,0)) v_8,sum(nvl(v_9,0)) v_9,sum(nvl(v_10,0)) v_10,sum(nvl(v_11,0)) v_11,sum(nvl(v_12,0)) v_12, sum(nvl(v_13,0)) v_13,sum(nvl(v_14,0)) v_14,sum(nvl(v_15,0)) v_15,sum(nvl(v_16,0)) v_16,sum(nvl(v_17,0)) v_17, sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_18,sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_19,sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_20,sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_21,sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_22, sum(nvl(v_13,0))-sum(nvl(v_18,0)) v_23,sum(nvl(v_14,0))-sum(nvl(v_19,0)) v_24,sum(nvl(v_15,0))-sum(nvl(v_20,0)) v_25,sum(nvl(v_16,0))-sum(nvl(v_21,0)) v_26,sum(nvl(v_17,0))-sum(nvl(v_22,0)) v_27, decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_13,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(sum(nvl(v_13,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_13,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(sum(nvl(v_8,0)),0,'0%',to_char(round((sum(nvl(v_18,0))/sum(nvl(v_8,0)))*100,2))||'%') v_30,gydwdm from jhzxqkb_xm group by gydwdm order by gydwdm
select * from jhzxqkb_xm order by sgydwdm,gydwdm,xmbm

select j.*,nvl(v_13,0)-nvl(v_18,0) v_23,nvl(v_14,0)-nvl(v_19,0) v_24,nvl(v_15,0)-nvl(v_20,0) v_25,nvl(v_16,0)-nvl(v_21,0) v_26,nvl(v_17,0)-nvl(v_22,0) v_27,decode(nvl(v_8,0),0,'0%',to_char(round((nvl(v_13,0)/nvl(v_8,0))*100,2))||'%') v_28,decode(nvl(v_13,0),0,'0%',to_char(round((nvl(v_18,0)/nvl(v_13,0))*100,2))||'%') v_29,decode(nvl(v_8,0),0,'0%',to_char(round((nvl(v_18,0)/nvl(v_8,0))*100,2))||'%') v_30 from jhzxqkb j order by sgydwdm,gydwdm,xmbm

select value id,text,state,(case when value not like '%v_%' then substr(id,0,length(id)-1) else id end) parent,id id1,xh from( select (case when value like '%v_%' then substr(value,0,instr(value,'v')-1) else value end) id,name text,'open' state,value,xh from ZDYBBBT where ssbb=#{ssbb} and value like #{treeno}||'%' ) order by (case when id like '%v_%' then id1||'v_' else id end), to_number(substr(id,instr(id, 'v') + 2)), xh

select t2.value, t2.name, t1.co, t2.hight, t2.rowxh, t2.width from (select substr1 value, count(*) co from zdybbbt where value in (${name}) and ssbb=#{ssbb} group by substr1 union all select substr2 value, count(*) co from zdybbbt where value in (${name}) and ssbb=#{ssbb} and substr2 is not null group by substr2 union all select substr3 value, count(*) co from zdybbbt where value in (${name}) and ssbb=#{ssbb} and substr3 is not null group by substr3 union all select value, count(*) co from zdybbbt where value in (${name}) and ssbb=#{ssbb} group by value) t1, zdybbbt t2 where t1.value = t2.value and ssbb=#{ssbb} order by t2.xh

select xzqhdm,(select name from xtgl_xzqh where id=xzqhdm)||'合计' v_1, nvl(sum(v_3),0) v_3,nvl(sum(v_4),0) v_4,nvl(sum(v_5),0) v_5, nvl(sum(v_6),0) v_6,nvl(sum(v_7),0) v_7,nvl(sum(v_8),0) v_8, nvl(sum(v_9),0) v_9,nvl(sum(v_10),0) v_10,nvl(sum(v_11),0) v_11, nvl(sum(v_12),0) v_12,nvl(sum(v_13),0) v_13,nvl(sum(v_14),0) v_14, nvl(sum(v_15),0) v_15,nvl(sum(v_16),0) v_16
from ( select rownum v_0,bb.* from (select xm.xmmc v_1,xd.jhxdwh v_2,xm.ztz v_3,nvl(xd.ztz,0) v_4,nvl(xd.cgs,0) v_5,nvl(xd.rys,0) v_6,nvl(xd.ztz,0)-nvl(xd.cgs,0)-nvl(xd.rys,0)-nvl(xd.dfzc,0) v_7,nvl(xd.dfzc,0) v_8, dw.sn v_9,dw.bn v_10,dw.ztz v_11,bf.sn v_12,bf.bn v_13,bf.ztz v_14,nvl(xd.ztz,0)-nvl(dw.ztz,0) v_15,nvl(dw.ztz,0)-nvl(bf.ztz,0) v_16,' ' v_17,substr(xm.xzqhdm,0,4)||'00' xzqhdm from xmjbxx_bb xm,jhzxqkb_xd xd, (select xmbm,jhxdwh,sum(decode(substr(dwyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}-1),bb+sb+df,0)) sn,sum(decode(substr(dwyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}),bb+sb+df,0)) bn,sum(bb+sb+df) ztz from tjbb_dw group by xmbm,jhxdwh) dw, (select xmbm,jhxdwh,sum(decode(substr(bfyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}-1),bb+sb+df,0)) sn,sum(decode(substr(bfyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}),bb+sb+df,0)) bn,sum(bb+sb+df) ztz from tjbb_bf group by xmbm,jhxdwh) bf where xm.xmbm=xd.xmid and xd.xmid=dw.xmbm(+) and xd.xmid=bf.xmbm(+) and xd.jhxdwh=dw.jhxdwh(+) and xd.jhxdwh=bf.jhxdwh(+) ${xzqhdm} and xm.gydwdm like #{gydw}||'%' ${jhxdwh} and xm.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%' ${xmlx} ${xmnf} order by xd.xdnf,xd.jhxdwh)bb ) group by xzqhdm order by xzqhdm

select xzqhdm,(select name from xtgl_xzqh where id=xzqhdm)||'合计' v_1, nvl(sum(v_3),0) v_3,nvl(sum(v_4),0) v_4,nvl(sum(v_5),0) v_5, nvl(sum(v_6),0) v_6,nvl(sum(v_7),0) v_7,nvl(sum(v_8),0) v_8, nvl(sum(v_9),0) v_9,nvl(sum(v_10),0) v_10,nvl(sum(v_11),0) v_11, nvl(sum(v_12),0) v_12,nvl(sum(v_13),0) v_13,nvl(sum(v_14),0) v_14, nvl(sum(v_15),0) v_15,nvl(sum(v_16),0) v_16
from ( select rownum v_0,bb.* from (select xm.xmmc v_1,xd.jhxdwh v_2,xm.ztz v_3,nvl(xd.ztz,0) v_4,nvl(xd.cgs,0) v_5,nvl(xd.rys,0) v_6,nvl(xd.ztz,0)-nvl(xd.cgs,0)-nvl(xd.rys,0)-nvl(xd.dfzc,0) v_7,nvl(xd.dfzc,0) v_8, dw.sn v_9,dw.bn v_10,dw.ztz v_11,bf.sn v_12,bf.bn v_13,bf.ztz v_14,nvl(xd.ztz,0)-nvl(dw.ztz,0) v_15,nvl(dw.ztz,0)-nvl(bf.ztz,0) v_16,' ' v_17,substr(xm.xzqhdm,0,4)||'00' xzqhdm from xmjbxx_bb_zrc xm,jhzxqkb_xd_zrc xd, (select xmbm,jhxdwh,sum(decode(substr(dwyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}-1),bb+sb+df,0)) sn,sum(decode(substr(dwyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}),bb+sb+df,0)) bn,sum(bb+sb+df) ztz from tjbb_dw_zrc group by xmbm,jhxdwh) dw, (select xmbm,jhxdwh,sum(decode(substr(bfyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}-1),bb+sb+df,0)) sn,sum(decode(substr(bfyf,0,4),to_char(${jhnf}),bb+sb+df,0)) bn,sum(bb+sb+df) ztz from tjbb_bf_zrc group by xmbm,jhxdwh) bf where xm.xmbm=xd.xmid and xd.xmid=dw.xmbm(+) and xd.xmid=bf.xmbm(+) and xd.jhxdwh=dw.jhxdwh(+) and xd.jhxdwh=bf.jhxdwh(+) ${xzqhdm} and xm.gydwdm like #{gydw}||'%' ${jhxdwh} and xm.xmmc like '%'||#{xmmc}||'%' ${xmlx} ${xmnf} order by xd.xdnf,xd.jhxdwh)bb ) group by xzqhdm order by xzqhdm
${sql}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM YY2CSBB WHERE NF=#{NF} AND YF=#{YF} AND GYDW=#{GYDW} AND XMLX=#{XMLX}
mapper.select:
SELECT XH,MIN(V_0) V_0, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_1),'1',0,v_1))),2)) v_1, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_2),'1',0,v_2))),2)) v_2, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_3),'1',0,v_3))),2)) v_3, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_4),'1',0,v_4))),2)) v_4, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_5),'1',0,v_5))),2)) v_5, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_6),'1',0,v_6))),2)) v_6, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_7),'1',0,v_7))),2)) v_7, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_8),'1',0,v_8))),2)) v_8, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_9),'1',0,v_9))),2)) v_9, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_10),'1',0,v_10))),2)) v_10, DECODE(SUBSTR(max(V_0),-1),'%',('要计算百分百'),FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(SUBSTR(V_0,-1),'%',0,decode(f_str_or_num(v_11),'1',0,v_11))),2)) v_11 FROM YY2CSBB WHERE 1=1 AND XMLX=#{xmlx} ${gydw} AND NF = #{nf} ${yf}
GROUP BY XH ORDER BY XH

SELECT XH, MIN(V_0) V_0, MIN(V_1) V_1, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_2), '1', 0, V_2)),2) V_2, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_3), '1', 0, V_3)),2) V_3, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_4), '1', 0, V_4)),2) V_4, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_5), '1', 0, V_5)),2) V_5, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_6), '1', 0, V_6)),2) V_6, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_7), '1', 0, V_7)),2) V_7, FUN_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(F_STR_OR_NUM(V_8), '1', 0, V_8)),2) V_8 FROM YY2CSBB WHERE 1=1 AND XMLX=#{xmlx} ${gydw} AND NF = #{nf} ${yf} GROUP BY XH ORDER BY XH
